sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; function ProductDetail( { item } ) { const { image, quantity, ...newItem} = item; const { id, name, alias, price, shortDescription, description } = newItem; const html = () => Object.keys(newItem).reduce( (total, key) => `${total}${key}${newItem[key]}`, ""); return (
ID { id }
Name { name }
Alias { alias }
Price { price }
About { shortDescription }
Detail { description }
); } export default ProductDetail;
